subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tom Coughlin, the coach of the Giants, who often seems dyspeptic while dealing with the normal minutia of his gloomy trade, was downright chipper after the Giants landed in London on Friday.
snippet: Tom Coughlin, the coach of the Giants, who often seems dyspeptic while dealing with the normal minutia of his gloomy trade, was downright chipper after the Giants landed in London on Friday.
